summary: CONSUMER STATES THE EXHAUST IS LOCATED AT THE RIGHT SIDE, CAUSING  THE TIRES TO  OVERHEAT  AND  BLOW UP. IN JULY FIRESTONE WILDERNESS HT SIZE 23570R16 DOT W2081PT WERE REPLACED BY GOODYEAR ,AND PROBLEM  STILL RECURRING.   DEALER STATED NOTHING WAS WRONG WITH THE EXHAUST PIPE. CONSUMER INDICATED THAT FIRESTONE DIAGNOSIS WAS THAT TIRE BLEW UP DUE TO OVERHEATING.  *AK
